title: Arbor Snowboards :: Product Profiles - Formula
description:
An accessible all-mountain rocker design that’s exceptionally easy to ride; the Formula is ideal to learn on and grow with, a confidence building cruiser that was created to provide you with the perfect blend of afford- ability, technology, and performance.
To learn more about the Formula visit: arborcollective.com/snowboards/products/formula/
